Statistical analysis Documentation

statistical_analysis.detect_outliers(data: DataFrame, column: str) → list[source]

Identify outliers in a dataset using the Isolation Forest algorithm.

Parameters:

  • data -- DataFrame containing the data

  • column -- Column name to analyze for outliers

Returns:

List of facility IDs classified as outliers

statistical_analysis.load_inventory_data(sector: str) → DataFrame[source]

Load facility-level inventory data for a given sector.

Parameters:

sector -- Industrial sector name (e.g., cement, hydrogen)

Returns:

DataFrame containing the inventory data

Raises:

FileNotFoundError -- If the required file is missing

statistical_analysis.plot_histogram(data: DataFrame, sector: str, pollutant: str, filename_suffix: str)[source]

Generate and save a histogram plot for pollutant flow amounts.

Parameters:

  • data -- DataFrame containing the pollutant data

  • sector -- Industrial sector name

  • pollutant -- Pollutant name

  • filename_suffix -- Suffix for the output filename

statistical_analysis.remove_outliers(data: ~pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, outlier_list: list) -> (<class 'pandas.core.frame.DataFrame'>, <class 'pandas.core.frame.DataFrame'>)[source]

Remove outliers from the dataset.

Parameters:

  • data -- DataFrame containing the facility data

  • outlier_list -- List of outlier facility IDs

Returns:

Tuple (cleaned data, outliers data)

statistical_analysis.save_data(data: DataFrame, sector: str, filename: str)[source]

Save DataFrame to a CSV file.

Parameters:

  • data -- DataFrame to save

  • sector -- Industrial sector name

  • filename -- Name of the output file

statistical_analysis.stat_analysis(sector: str)[source]

Perform statistical analysis and outlier detection on facility-level emissions data.

Parameters:

sector -- Industrial sector name
